context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

seek assistance from government programs, charitable organizations, pharmaceutical assistance programs or try to set up a crowd funding campaign in order to raise funds for his wife’s medication

explore different options to find financial assistance
explore all possible resources to obtain the medication
consult with the doctor and pharmacist about possible alternative treatments or cheaper medications
appeal to the insurance company or start a fundraiser to help cover the costs of his wife's medication
seek help from various sources

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any reliable ride service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

call a taxi, Uber or another type of ride service to quickly get him to the airport

call a taxi, an Uber or a friend who can quickly pick him up and drive him to the airport while he arranges for his car's tow service
call for a taxi or use a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service to get to the airport as fast as possible, while also contacting an emergency car service to handle his car problems
call for a taxi, Uber, or any quick transportation service to take him to the airport
call a tow truck or use roadside assistance to handle his car and then immediately call a taxi, an Uber, or any other form of quick transportation to get him to the airport as soon as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check the security camera footage to see if any theft occurred
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the store owner
check the security camera footage to see if any theft occurred
investigate what could have happened to the missing money
immediately inform his superior or the owner about the missing money and work with them to figure out possible reasons for the discrepancy
thoroughly recheck his calculations and daily transactions to see if he made any error
double check all the transactions for the day
double-check all the sales transactions and receipts for the day
contact his supervisor and explain the situation
immediately inform his superior or owner about the missing money, and double-check all the transactions for the day in case a mistake has occurred

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

generation: contact her teacher and explain the situation
explain the situation to her teacher immediately
explain the situation to her teacher honestly, ask for an extension, and ensure she brings the assignment the next day

explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask for an extension, assuring the teacher that it was an unintended mishap and that she would bring the assignment the following day or submit it as soon as possible
explain the situation to her teacher, honestly and sincerely, and ask for an extension to turn in the homework assignment
email her teacher or talk to them directly before the class about the situation and ask for an extension or a chance to hand it in later

explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit her homework
explain the situation to her teacher before class starts, preferably with a note from her mom or a phone call
explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask for a chance to turn in the assignment later or the next day

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put in one place
make sure everyone stays together
create a visible signal for rescue crews
stay put and try to make a shelter, while keeping warm with his available clothes and lighting a fire if possible
stay put and try to make themselves visible for a potential aerial rescue
stay put and create a situation that will make him and his team noticeable, such as making a large visible sign or signal fire if possible
stay put and create a signal for help
build a shelter to protect them from the cold

stay in one location to make it easier for rescuers to find him and his group, find a way to signal for help, such as creating a smoke signal or using a mirror to flash sunlight; keep warm by building a fire, and ration the remaining food and water until help arrives
stay in one place, ideally in a location that's easily visible from the air and near a natural landmark, making it easier for the rescue crew to locate them
